price: Anaasε wͻ’nhunuu nnomaa a wͻn wͻ wͻn apampamu a, wͻ’tu bae wͻn ntaban mu san ka to mu no? Obiara nkuta wͻn mu, na mmom Ahummͻborͻ Hene no ara. Nokorε sε, Ɔno na Ohunu biribiara.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَٰٓفَّٰتٖ وَيَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءِۭ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā al-ṭayri fawqahum ṣāffātin wayaqbiḍ'na mā yum'sikuhunna illā al-raḥmānu innahu bikulli shayin baṣīrun
